fixes: Introduced newer strings for custom locale.
Unread count of previous meeting is now not visible in the current meeting within the same app session.
Upgraded to dyte_core v0.4.1.
Make listeners list safe from modification while callbacks in progress
Participant video sync in `DyteParticipantTile` component.
Fixed iOS Screenshare, crashed after 3-4 sec due to memory limitation.
Return appropriate error details on Exception Page
Fixed loader issue on end meeting for all/on removed from meeting/exiting from setup screen.
Fixed video flickering issue when meeting is idle for a few seconds.
Hidden chat button if the user can't send chat.

features: You can skip setup screen by passing `skipSetupScreen` param to `true` in `DyteUIKitBuilder.build()` method.

fixes: You can join room without any exception when title is null.
Fixed previous meet join with different authToken in same app session.
Fixed respecting limit on screenshare count from dev portal.
Added cleanup native listeners methods on release/leave meeting complete.

features: Added screenshare button checks for webinar and livestream control bars.
Introduced DyteReleaseResourcesButton widget (to be used if you want to exit SDK before joining the call).
fixes: Fixed themes for participant page, chat message layout.
Renamed ParticipantsPage to DyteParticipantsPage.
Fixed audio/video toggling buttons visibility if participant is offstage.
Populated error details onMeetingInitFailed()/onMeetingJoinFailed().
Added viewer list for webinar
Added check for screenshare option
Fixed stage privileges when host is off-stage.

features: You can now use exportable components: DyteMeetingTitle, DyteJoinButton, DyteLeaveButton, DyteLeaveMeetingDialog, DyteParticipantTile, DyteSelfAudioToggle, DyteSelfVideoToggle.
dep_api: The builder method (DyteUiKitBuilder.build(...), now takes BuildContext as a required parameter.

fixes: Reverted `WillPopScope` changes

features: Changed poll design, removed vote button
Added plugin active/deactivate button on plugin screen.
Added loaders for audio/video toggle buttons.
fixes: Removed disable all videos button.
Changed notification option from bottom to top.
Minor design changes on Plugin screen and app bar.
Fixed multiple `(you)` tag fixes.

features: Unread count badge on more button in control bar.
Added notification when reconnection in progress.
Added labels to audio/video control bar buttons.
Added custom color to IconButoon that overrides design token
fixes: Fixed button updation as per stage permission.
Fixed appbar title invisibility.
Disabled kick option for self.
Fixed design token colors to be respected for control bar audio/video buttons.
Added center text when stage is empty.

features: Central stage implemented for webinar and livestream.
fixes: Reconnection fixes
Poll view voters button logic fixed.
Refactor meeting, livestream & webinar screens.
